devDependencies.@types/*: Type definitions for various libraries to help with TypeScript type checking.
devDependencies.circular-dependency-plugin: A webpack plugin to detect modules with circular dependencies.
devDependencies.cross-env: Set and use environment variables across platforms. Used to achieve local customized eslint rules.
devDependencies.css-loader: Webpack loader for importing CSS files in JavaScript modules.
devDependencies.electron: Framework for creating native applications with web technologies.
devDependencies.jsdom: JavaScript-based DOM simulation tools for Node.js. Useful when testing in Mocha environment.
devDependencies.link-module-alias: Link and resolve aliases of modules in Node.js. Used to achieve local customized eslint rules.
devDependencies.mini-css-extract-plugin: Extracts CSS from your bundles into separate files.
devDependencies.mocha and mochapack: Testing framework and its webpack integration.
devDependencies.node-loader: Webpack loader for Node.js native modules.
devDependencies.ora: Node.js spinner for showing progress in terminal.
devDependencies.prosemirror-test-builder: Utility libraries for fast building proseMirror elements.
devDependencies.sass and sass-loader: CSS pre-processor and its Webpack loader.
devDependencies.tsconfig-paths: Load node modules using paths from tsconfig.
devDependencies.typescript: JavaScript superset offering static type checking.
devDependencies.webpack and related packages: Module bundler and its various plugins/loaders.
devDependencies.katex: Renders plain text into math equations.

dependencies.chokidar: Filesystem watcher. Used to achieve file watching on different platform.
dependencies.minimist: Parse argument options. Good tiny lib to use.
